certname-dsa1024.help: 1024 bit DSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-dsa1024.name: certname-dsa1024

certname-dsa2048.help: 2048 bit DSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-dsa2048.name: certname-dsa2048

certname-ecdsa256.help: 256 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa256.name: certname-ecdsa256

certname-ecdsa384.help: 384 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa384.name: certname-ecdsa384

certname-ecdsa521.help: 521 bit ECDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ecdsa521.name: certname-ecdsa521

certname-ed25519.help: 253 bit EdDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ed25519.name: certname-ed25519

certname-ed448.help: 456 bit EdDSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-ed448.name: certname-ed448

certname-rsa1024.help: 1024 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa1024.name: certname-rsa1024

certname-rsa2048.help: 2048 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa2048.name: certname-rsa2048

certname-rsa4096.help: 4096 bit RSA key certificate for re-signing server certificates for SSL inspection.
certname-rsa4096.name: certname-rsa4096

check-ca-cert.help: Enable/disable verification of the user certificate and pass authentication if any CA in the chain is trusted (default = enable).
check-ca-cert.name: check-ca-cert

options.help: Enable verification of the user certificate.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable verification of the user certificate.
options.name: disable

check-ca-chain.help: Enable/disable verification of the entire certificate chain and pass authentication only if the chain is complete and all of the CAs in the chain are trusted (default = disable).
check-ca-chain.name: check-ca-chain

options.help: Enable verification of the entire certificate chain.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable verification of the entire certificate chain.
options.name: disable

cmp-key-usage-checking.help: Enable/disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode (default = enable).
cmp-key-usage-checking.name: cmp-key-usage-checking

options.help: Enable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable server certificate key usage checking in CMP mode.
options.name: disable

cmp-save-extra-certs.help: Enable/disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode (default = disable).
cmp-save-extra-certs.name: cmp-save-extra-certs

options.help: Enable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable saving extra certificates in CMP mode.
options.name: disable

cn-allow-multi.help: When searching for a matching certificate, allow multiple CN fields in certificate subject name (default = enable).
cn-allow-multi.name: cn-allow-multi

options.help: Does not allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching.
options.name: disable

options.help: Allow multiple CN entries in certificate matching.
options.name: enable

cn-match.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do CN value matching with certificate subject name (default = substring).
cn-match.name: cn-match

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate CN.
options.name: substring

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate CN.
options.name: value

chain-crl-absence.help: CRL verification option when CRL of any certificate in chain is absent (default = ignore).
chain-crl-absence.name: chain-crl-absence

options.help: CRL verification is ignored if CRL of any certificate in chain is absent.
options.name: ignore

options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL of any certificate in chain is absent.
options.name: revoke

expiry.help: CRL verification option when CRL is expired (default = ignore).
expiry.name: expiry

options.help: Certificate status will be verified even if CRL is expired.
options.name: ignore

options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL is expired.
options.name: revoke

leaf-crl-absence.help: CRL verification option when leaf CRL is absent (default = ignore).
leaf-crl-absence.name: leaf-crl-absence

options.help: CRL verification against leaf certificate is ignored if CRL is absent.
options.name: ignore

options.help: Certificate will be revoked if CRL of leaf certificate is absent.
options.name: revoke

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface automatically.
options.name: auto

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

options.help: Set outgoing interface manually.
options.name: specify

ocsp-option.help: Specify whether the OCSP URL is from certificate or configured OCSP server.
ocsp-option.name: ocsp-option

options.help: Use URL from certificate.
options.name: certificate

options.help: Use URL from configured OCSP server.
options.name: server

ocsp-status.help: Enable/disable receiving certificates using the OCSP.
ocsp-status.name: ocsp-status

options.help: Enable setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable setting.
options.name: disable

ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
ssl-min-proto-version.name: ssl-min-proto-version

options.help: Follow system global setting.
options.name: default

options.help: SSLv3.
options.name: SSLv3

options.help: TLSv1.
options.name: TLSv1

options.help: TLSv1.1.
options.name: TLSv1-1

options.help: TLSv1.2.
options.name: TLSv1-2

ssl-ocsp-source-ip.help: Source IP address to use to communicate with the OCSP server.
ssl-ocsp-source-ip.name: ssl-ocsp-source-ip

options.help: Enable strict mode CRL checking.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable strict mode CRL checking.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable strict mode OCSP checking.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable strict mode OCSP checking.
options.name: disable

subject-match.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do RDN value matching with certificate subject name (default = substring).
subject-match.name: subject-match

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a part or the same as a certificate subject RDN.
options.name: substring

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is same as a certificate subject RDN.
options.name: value

subject-set.help: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to do RDN set matching with certificate subject name (default = subset).
subject-set.name: subject-set

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a subset of a certificate subject.
options.name: subset

options.help: Find a match if the name being searched for is a superset of a certificate subject.
options.name: superset
